articles.author: Callum Wells
articles.title: Kate Beckinsale shares clip of her gleeful reaction to England's win over Senegal - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 49, threw her arms in the air and climbed onto her friend's back as she led the stars reacting to their her home country beating Senegal 3-0.
articles.content:
Kate Beckinsale took to Instagram on Sunday night as she shared a hilarious clip of her reaction to England's impressive World Cup win.
